name: Megaiden
description:
Hi there,

I published this prototype to share it with family and friends, I will continue improving it delivering more and more updates so probably one day will become a full game itself.

In order to play this demo you will need a controller (preferable xbox ) this is still a prototype I didn't develop yet to play it with keyboard.


please keep in mind this is  demo/prototype and uses different free assets but it also has original assets as well and all the music was composed only for this demo.

This is a prototype I have been working for some time now,  the whole idea behind was to create a something that resonates with the spirit from classic megaman and ninja gaiden games from NES era.

please feel free to leave any comments,
I hope you enjoy it and have a good time with it.
